original_text:
And Balaam took up his discourse and said,
“From Aram Balak has brought me,
    the king of Moab from the eastern mountains:
‘Come, curse Jacob for me,
    and come, denounce Israel!’
korean_text: 발람이 예언을 전하여 말하되 발락이 나를 아람에서, 모압 왕이 동쪽 산에서 데려다가 이르기를 와서 나를 위하여 야곱을 저주하라, 와서 이스라엘을 꾸짖으라 하도다

sentences.original_text: And Balaam took up his discourse and said,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 발람은 그의 담화를 시작하여 말하되,

sentences.original_text: the king of Moab from the eastern mountains:
